description: Display of internally illuminated fascia and projecting signs.
subdivision_of_building: ground floor entrance only and fascia
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed Location Plan PP-12517593v1, 8661/ AP-01, 8661/ PL - 01. 
Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme. 
Condition : 2 - The maximum steady brightness of the fascia sign hereby permitted is not to exceed 75 candelas per sq.m.
Reason: To ensure the sign does not have an adverse effect on the amenity of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.
Condition : 3 - The maximum steady brightness of the projecting sign hereby permitted is not to exceed 75 candelas per sq.m. 
Reason: To ensure the proposed sign does not have an adverse effect on the amenity of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (adopted July 2023) and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.
Condition : 4 - The illumination of the signs hereby permitted shall be by static illumination only. 
Reason: In the interest of highway safety and of the visual amenities of the locality in accordance with Council policy LP9 and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.
Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE: In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application. The Council has made available detailed advice in the form of its statutory policies in the Local Plan (2023), Supplementary Planning Documents and where appropriate the Site Specific Allocations Document as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition, where appropriate, further guidance was offered to the applicant during the processing of the application.
